c74object.name: seq.sequence~

attribute.name: offset
attribute.digest: Shifts the sequence after scaling according to high and low

attribute.name: low
attribute.digest: Sets the lower bound of sequence.

attribute.name: high
attribute.digest: Sets the upper bound of the sequence

attribute.name: stepsize
attribute.digest: Shifts the sequence after scaling according to high and low

c74object.description: seq.sequence~ takes a list of values and plays them back in response to counter
c74object.digest: Store and play back lists of values
